data.title: Palmer Music Store Conway Arkansas
data.meta_description: We’ve helped 1000s of folks find the right instrument, connect with the right teacher, and make music a huge part of life. Come and see Palmer Music store!
data.text:
YOU + MUSIC = AWESOME!

INSTRUMENTS, LESSONS, & REPAIRS IN CENTRAL ARKANSAS

UP NEXT AT PMC...

Check back here for the latest news, events, parties, giveaways, & more! We’ve got so much coming that we can’t wait to share with you.

Check back here for the latest news, events, parties, giveaways, & more! We’ve got so much coming that we can’t wait to share with you.

Learn To Play

Find What You Need

Have a Blast

Learn to Play

Find what you need

Have a blast

Palmer Music Store

Say Hello

to friendly musicians

Whether you’re new to music or have been playing for years, you shouldn’t be talked down to.

And you shouldn’t feel dumb for asking a simple question.

YOU SHOULD you should be treated like you.

Find What You Need

Music Lessons

Helping you learn & love to play is the foundation of everything we do.

Instruments & Equipment

Our entire selection is personally set-up & tuned -up as if it were our very own.

Repair & care

From restringing your kid’s guitar to restoring your grandpa’s family heirloom.

LOOKING FOR SCHOOL BAND INSTRUMENTS?

You’re Awesome

Music is Awesome

Let’s put those

2 things together

It's Crazy Simple

1) Come to the store

We’re here for YOU.

Our friendly staff is here to listen to your needs and help you find what you’re looking for.

2) make your CONNECTion

Music is all about connections.

Get your hands on the right instrument. Connect with the right teacher. Find advice from experts who don’t talk over your head.

3) have a great time

It may your first time playing. Smiling with your instructor. Or cracking a joke with our repair guys.

No matter what, we promise

you’re gonna love it here.

"like family"

“My son has taken lessons here for over a year now and we absolutely love it. The staff is very friendly and helpful. They are like one big family. If you are interested in music lessons of any kind I would recommend this place with a 10 out of 10”

We're Committed

to helping you...

get your questions answered in language you can understand

find instruments that meet your needs and your budget

learn from instructors who are on your side

Never Miss a Deal

promotions, free events, discounts and sales

delivered by tiny musical elves directly to your inbox

Name

Email

"amazing people"

“Amazing people work here. You get exactly what you pay for. You are being taught by some of the finest musicians in Arkansas.”

We’ve got you covered

We’ve got you covered

You’re thinking about doing something with music, but you’ve got questions.

You need a place to get simple answers and try things out.

And let’s be honest, it can be a little scary to walk into a music store for the first time.

Is it OK if I don’t know anything about music?

Can these people really help me out?

We totally get it. We are here for Y-O-U!

Over the last 10 years, we’ve helped thousands of people in Central Arkansas find what they need to make music a deeper part of their life.

We’ve answered questions, listened to concerns, and had blast the entire time. We also happened to make some life-long friends along the way.

We’d love to do the same with you!

Maybe you’ve been thinking about buying your first instrument.

Or you want your kid to learn to play in an actual band.

Or maybe you just need someone to take a look at your grandpa’s 100-year-old banjo.

No matter what you need, you should know that the music store you choose has got your back.

"all the stars"

“All the stars…I was new to town – stopped in to grab some new strings and check on some prices. But I also knew my guitar needed a set up. Their repair techs did phenomenal work! My guitar has a new life! Everyone in the store treated me like a valued customer .For one customer to walk in and leave feeling the way I did speaks volumes”

Come on in

so you can get connected

We can’t wait to meet you!

Here’s where you can find us

1131 Front St,

Conway, AR, 72032

Store Hours

Weekdays 10 – 6

Saturdays 10 – 5

Lessons available til 8pm
